name: 高淩菁
objective:
多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析・課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
Multivariate analysis is to analyze more then two variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting…etc. The contents of the course: factor analysis, principal component analysis, multiple regression analysis, multiple discriminate analysis, multiple analysis of variance, canonical correlation analysis, cluster analysis, conjoint analysis, SEM…etc.
schedule:
Week	Date	Topic
1	9/12	 Course overview
2	9/19	 Multivariate Data and Multivariate Analysis
                 R Introduction
3	9/26	 Matrix Algebra and Statistics Introduction
4	10/3	 PCA & EFA
5	10/10 Class recess for national day
6	10/17 PCA & EFA
7	10/24 Cluster Analysis
8	10/31 Cluster Analysis
9	11/7	 Midterm Exam
10	11/14 Logistic Regression
11	11/21 Logistic Regression
12	11/28 Discriminate Analysis
13	12/5	Discriminate Analysis
14	12/12 Multidimensional Scaling
15	12/19 Multidimensional Scaling
16	12/26 Project Discussion
17	1/2	  Project Presentation
18	1/9	  Final Exam
scorePolicy:
25%  Midterm Exam
25%	 Final Exam
50%  Project Presentation
materials:
Course Materials: 
•	An Introduction to Applied Multivariate Analysis with R
http://libholding.ntut.edu.tw/bookDetail.do?id=324769

Supporting Materials:
•	Applied Multivariate Statistical Analysis by Richard A., Johnson and Dean W. Wichern (2007)
http://docshare04.docshare.tips/files/12598/125983744.pdf
•	R for Marketing Research and Analytics, Chapman and Feit (2015)
https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007%2F978-3-030-14316-9
•	A Little Book of R for Multivariate Analysis
https://buildmedia.readthedocs.org/media/pdf/little-book-of-r-for-multivariate-analysis/latest/little-book-of-r-for-multivariate-analysis.pdf
